sage.renderer.jogl

Class JOGLContextCapabilities

  • java.lang.Object
    • sage.renderer.jogl.JOGLContextCapabilities

  • public final class JOGLContextCapabilities
extends java.lang.Object
    This class collects all of the settings for a specific GLContext, avoiding unnecessary communications with the graphics hardware for settings which won't change. The class is patterned after the LWJGL implementation, but goes the additional step of accessing common integer and float values. This instance is not immutable, in order to allow the values to be updated whenever the device associated with the GLDrawable has changed.
    Author:
    Steve Vaughan (original JME class), John Clevenger (ported to SAGE)
